channel.title: What to do after you win as scorned/inquisitor?
channel.description: Noob question, but after you win with scorned/inquisitor and you are still alive what should you do? Can you side with anyone you want or is it considered gamethrowing if you help another faction?

item.title: What to do after you win as scorned/inquisitor?
item.dc:creator: chawklette
item.description:
I like to help BD win
Or as inquisitor just kill random magic users for fun

Read full topic
item.source: What to do after you win as scorned/inquisitor?

item.title: What to do after you win as scorned/inquisitor?
item.dc:creator: Asew54321
item.description:
You literally cannot gamethrow after you have won as Inquisitor or Scorned unless you leave the game. Just do whatever you want unless it breaks any other rules.

Read full topic
item.source: What to do after you win as scorned/inquisitor?
